tool_description: Organizes, indexes, and processes received FOIA documents, extracting metadata and creating searchable summaries.

document_files.description: List of document file paths or names

request_topic.description: Main topic or subject of the original FOIA request

extract_entities.description: Whether to extract names, dates, and key terms

error_messages: Document files not accessible: One or more specified document files cannot be read or accessed.
Unsupported file format: Some documents are in formats that cannot be processed.
Processing failed: Document processing encountered errors. Check file integrity.
Invalid date format: Use ISO 8601 date-time format for date_received.
usage: Provide list of document_files, request details (topic, agency, tracking number), and date_received. Optionally enable index creation, entity extraction, and redaction analysis. Returns organized document metadata and analysis.

total_pages.description: Total number of pages across all documents

document_types.description: Types of documents found (email, memo, report, etc.)

date_range.description: Date range covered by the documents

key_entities.description: Important names, organizations, and terms extracted

redaction_summary.description: Analysis of redaction patterns and extent

organization_summary.description: Summary of how documents were organized and indexed
